item.description:
Meet Saturday, July 10 @ 11:00 a.m. for

FREE BAGELS, CREAM CHEESE, DUNKIN DONUTS COFFEE and ORANGE JUICE @ Howard Johnson Hotel Fenway

GROUP RIDE LEAVES AT 12:00 NOON

STOPS AT LARZ ANDERSON PARK during MICRO MINI CAR DAY at the MUSEUM OF TRANSPORTATION (Moment of Silence for / Scooter Tribute to John Gerber)

and continues to the Boston waterfront!

This is a great opportunity to see the world-famous Emerald Necklace Park System designed by Frederick Law Olmstead, visit one of Boston's great swimmable urban beaches and EAT DELICIOUS BURGERS, DOGS & FRIED SEAFOOD FOR LUNCH at SULLIVANS @ CASTLE ISLAND!

for a video from last year, vist:

http://www.fuel.tv/FU....
item.name: Large Group Ride
